title: Create data-operations patterns (3)
description: Create three data operation patterns: csv-transform.pattern.md, json-parse.pattern.md, and excel-read.pattern.md. Each includes error handling for malformed data, encoding issues, and validation steps.
notes: Created 3 data-operations patterns: csv-transform.pattern.md (pandas/csv processing), json-parse.pattern.md (JSON reading/validation), excel-read.pattern.md (Excel file processing with openpyxl).
